name: Musical Escape Room
description:
This is a short game that I made for my bachelor's project in Music Technology. The purpose of the game is to demonstrate how sound and musical concepts can be used as video game mechanics and to teach the player some principles around music theory and music technology.

The goal is to complete 4 different puzzles. When you have completed them, you can exit the door, and the game is then finished.

Controls:

"W", "A", "S", "D" - Walking

"C" - Crouch

"Left Click" - Interact

Playthrough:
